content:
Diagnosis:
Colloid carcinoma of pancreas, T2N1M0, ATM mutation positive

Previous treatment:
Whipple's procedure 15 January 2024
Adjuvant FOLFIRINOX chemotherapy March-July 2024

Current medications:
Pancreatic enzyme replacement
Metformin for chemotherapy-induced diabetes

Current situation:
Post-treatment surveillance

I reviewed [redacted name] today for first surveillance following completion of adjuvant chemotherapy. CT scan performed last week shows no evidence of disease recurrence. Blood tests including CA19-9 are within normal range. Nutritional status has improved with 3kg weight gain over past month. Managing well on current dose of pancreatic enzymes with good appetite and stable blood glucose readings.

Plan:
Continue current supportive medications
Repeat CT scan and tumor markers in 3 months
Follow up appointment to be arranged following imaging
